remarks: If ` S ` is a two-sided ideal in ` R ` , then the "natural map" from elements to their cosets is a ring homomorphism from ` R ` to ` R / S ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
qusring.u $e |- U = ( R /s ( R ~QG S ) ) $.
qusring.i $e |- I = ( 2Ideal ` R ) $.
qusrhm.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
qusrhm.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> [ x ] ( R ~QG S ) ) $.
qusrhm $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. I ) -> F e. ( R RingHom U ) ) $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d U x $.
$d X x $.
